ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Gems!
ygData.msgSnippet: You can resume paused games at a later stage.  To pause, click on the game window, click done and go do something else.  To resume, type /gems and click on
ygData.messageBody:
You can resume paused games at a later stage. To pause, click on the game
window, click "done" and go do something else. To resume, type /gems and
click on the paused screen to continue.

I'm not sure if this works if you re-log.

Worryingly enough, I saw a group in Karnors almost get wiped out last night
because their Enchanter was busy playing gems while medding.

>Why do you keep saying that you can play non stop. I don't
>understand what you are saying. Do you mean that there is a way >to make
it so the game doesn't reset when you log? I'm >confused.
